result.name: Whole genome sequencing of Red Chittagong Cattle (RCC) cattle and insight into candidate gene mutations associated with disease resistance
result.description: The aim of this research is to investigate Red Chittagong Cattle (RCC) genome to create a morecomplete catalog of genetic variants, a resource for future studies to understand variationunderlying important phenotypes (disease resistance and beef production)
result.center: Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
